long_description: Add variety to your performance food regimen with the great-tasting Clif Shot Bloks Fastpak. A great complement to gels and bars, Bloks help you keep up your energy and intensity. Linear Fastpak packaging is much more compact than the original packaging and makes the Bloks easy to dispense by simply squeezing one end of the package. Package of six 10g Bloks provide essential electrolytes and carbohydrates to replenish muscle energy and efficiency. Bloks are certified USDA Organic with 100% natural sourced ingredients for clean burning energy that won't weigh you down. Easy-to-chew Bloks provide 100 calories per 3 Bloks, making it easy to track caloric intake during longer activity. Chocolate Cherry and Black Cherry flavors contain 50mg of caffeine per serving; Orange flavor contains 25mg of caffeine per serving. Margarita flavor includes 3 times the sodium of other flavors. No artificial colors, flavors, sweeteners or preservatives. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Add variety to your performance food regimen with the great-tasting Clif Shot Bloks Fastpak. A great complement to gels and bars, Bloks help you keep up your energy and intensity.
